Question: Often the two could be seen taking rides in this person's automobile through Oak Park, and they became the talk of the town.
Hints: Another son and architect, John Lloyd ****, invented Lincoln Logs in 1918, and practiced extensively in the San Diego area.
Much of modern architecture, including the early work of Mies van der Rohe, can be traced back to this person's innovative work.
Though most famous as an architect, this person was an active dealer in Japanese art, primarily ukiyo-e woodblock prints.
